text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea hopeifolia (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Yellow Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is a tree found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia, Borneo and the Philippines.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea hopeifolia". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33116A9757920. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33116A9757920.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
